actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 95-1541.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide that annuity contracts purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences shall be entitled to the benefits of section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from taxation annuity contracts purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences for a civilian faculty or staff member of such University.

titles.title: A bill to provide that annuity contracts purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences shall be entitled to the benefits of section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
